RNS Number : 1865TGlenveagh Properties PLC23 November 2021

Glenveagh Properties plc

Transaction in Own Shares

Glenveagh Properties plc ("Glenveagh") announces that on 22 November 2021 it purchased the following number of its ordinary shares (the "ordinary shares") on Euronext Dublin, from Glenveagh's broker J&E Davy.

Number of ordinary shares purchased:

375,000

Highest price paid per share:

€1.160

Lowest price paid per share:

€1.150

Volume weighted average price paid:

€1.155

The purchases form part of the Glenveagh's share buyback programme announced on 16 November 2021.

Following settlement and cancellation of the above transactions, Glenveagh will have 793,884,384 ordinary shares in issue. Glenveagh holds nil ordinary shares in treasury.

In accordance with Article 5(1)(b) of Regulation (EU) No 596/2014 (the Market Abuse Regulation), a detailed breakdown of individual trades made by J&E Davy on behalf of Glenveagh as part of the buyback programme is scheduled to this announcement.
